description: The code is bypassing the hostname verification by returning true when the hostname is "192.168.0.10", which could lead to improper certificate validation and expose the system to man-in-the-middle attacks.
recommendation: Implement proper hostname verification by comparing the actual hostname with the one extracted from the SSL certificate. Ensure that the SSL/TLS certificates are validated against the hostname of the server to prevent man-in-the-middle attacks.
